basics.name: Wilson Espina
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: As a software engineer with 6 years' experience, I am skilled in building enterprise-level, customer-facing web applications with a focus on technical coordination. I thrive in the dynamic frontend landscape and enjoy exploring new technologies. Along with leading technical workstreams, I foster a friendly work environment and support junior engineers while promoting best practices within Agile delivery teams.
